question.body: The catecholamines are one class of tyrosine amine hormones and include:

response.feedback: Correct. Epinephrine and norepinephrine are collectively known as catecholamines.
Incorrect. Thyroxine is a type of tyrosine amine hormone but it is not a catecholamine.
Incorrect. Triiodothyronine is a type of tyrosine amine hormone but it is not a catecholamine.
Incorrect. Melatonin is a tryptophan amine hormone.
